Rule.NonCompliantComment: GPG keys for package verification are not properly configured, which may allow installation of unsigned packages.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Import and configure the necessary GPG keys to ensure that packages are verified.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: Package manager repositories are not correctly configured, which can lead to missing updates.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure the appropriate repository entries in the sources.list file.
Rule.Correction: echo "deb http://deb.debian.org/debian stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list; apt-get update

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The system is not updated with the latest patches and security updates, exposing it to vulnerabilities.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Install all available updates, patches, and additional security software.
Rule.Verification: apt-get -s upgrade | grep -q "0 upgraded" && echo 0 || echo 1
